content: grandma s favorite lace dishcloth © debbie trainor 2023 materials pattern notes worsted weight cotton yarn grandma s favorite has been passed 70 yards down from knitter to knitter this is u s size 7 knitting needles my variation on the classic dishcloth adding a little texture to the traditional garter stitch cloth finished size 8 inch square http //stitchesbydebbie com email debbie@stitchesbydebbie com grandma s favorite lace dishcloth instructions cast on 4 stitches next row k1 k2tog k1 next row knit next row slip 1 k2tog psso next row k2 yo knit to end cut yarn and pull end through final loop repeat last row until there are 15 stitches on the needle begin pattern next row k2 yo k1 yo k2tog to last 4 stitches k4 next row k2 yo k1 purl to last 4 stitches k4 next 6 row k2 yo knit to end repeat 8 row pattern three times in total next row k2 yo k1 yo k2tog to last 4 stitches k4 next row k2 yo k1 purl to last 4 stitches k4 next 4 row k2 yo knit to end begin decrease next 2 row k1 k2tog yo k2tog knit to end begin decrease pattern abbreviations used next row k1 k2tog yo k2tog yo k2tog k-knit to last 4 stitches k4 p-purl k2tog-knit 2 together next row k1 k2tog yo k2tog purl to last 4 ssk-slip slip knit stitches k4 m1-make 1 psso-pass slip_stitch over next 6 row k1 k2tog yo k2tog knit to end repeat 8 row decrease pattern four times in total then k1 k2tog yo k2tog knit to end repeat above row until 4 stitches remain http //stitchesbydebbie com email debbie@stitchesbydebbie com
